title: Resolve Workplace Conflict
description: Two team members are having a dispute that is affecting team morale. Their manager asks HR to mediate.

tasks.description: Schedule a mediation session with both employees and the HR business partner.
Facilitate a conversation where both employees can voice their perspectives in a structured manner.
tasks.expected_outcome: HRBP guides the conversation to ensure it remains productive.

tasks.description: Help the employees agree on a set of actions to improve their working relationship and document this agreement.
tasks.expected_outcome: HRBP helps draft a written agreement which both employees sign.
